Title: Sleeveless Long Evening Dress with Cut Out Back

----

Sku: 8710

Sizes: 14, 10, 6, 12, 16, 4, 8, 18

----

Colors: black, mint, coral, royal

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: 8710-black-sleeveless-long-evening-dress-with-cut-out-back_p.jpg

----

Description: This gown features pleating and an illusion bodice. The  ruched bodice with  V-neck drapes into a sheer fabric covered in jewels and sequins. The sequin design continues to a peak on the ruffled chiffon skirt. The layering of the chiffon skirt compliments the open back perfectly.
